channel.title: john-1:4 on My Dev Blog
channel.description: Recent content in john-1:4 on My Dev Blog

item.title: Building a K3s Cluster with Armbian on Orange Pi 5 Plus
item.description: In this blog post, I’ll be sharing my practical journey of building a K3s Cluster on the Orange Pi 5 Plus (opi5+) using Armbian as the Operating System (OS) and Ansible. The post is meant as a straightforward guide for anyone looking to replicate the process. I hope it proves helpful for your own setup. Please consider that in some sections, there are references to external guides containing the respective steps.
